data.title: SPA President Meets with Vice President of Chinese News Agency in Middle East
data.meta_description:
Riyadh, October 27, 2022, SPA -- President of the Saudi Press Agency (SPA) Dr. Fahd bin Hassan Al Aqran today met with Vice President of the Chinese Xinhua News Agency in Middle East Wu Chong Min on the sidelines of the 6th edition of the Future Investment Initiative (FII6), being held at the King Abdul Aziz International Conference Center in Riyadh under the theme “'Investing in Humanity: Enabling a New Global Order.”
    The meeting went over issues related to news exchange and discussed aspects of cooperation between the two agencies to benefit from each side’s expertise.
    SPA president stressed that the media scene in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia is changing rapidly, referring to the important role of social media in this regard.
    For her part, Xinhua deputy president said that the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia has a big weight in the Arab and Islamic worlds and that cooperation between the two friendly countries in media fields will contribute to developing media outlets.
    --SPA
15:07 LOCAL TIME 12:07  GMT   
0013
